abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32515084, pmid32514047, pmid32515253, pmid32497297, pmid32516072, pmid32514077, pmid32511673, pmid32496872, pmid32516035, pmid32513797, pmid32512579, pmid32515802, pmid32496864, pmid32497191, pmid32513989, pmid32520306, pmid32506683, pmid32513807, pmid32493812, pmid32496518, pmid32520406, pmid32513323, pmid32516046, pmid32516064
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.11
